text: The municipality is located in Krapina-Zagorje County in northern Croatia. Mihovljan is a village and municipality in Krapina-Zagorje County in Croatia. According to the 2011 census, the area has a population of 1,938, the absolute majority of whom are Croats. ==References== Category:Populated places in Krapina-Zagorje County Category:Municipalities of Croatia
title: Mihovljan, Krapina-Zagorje County
